## Running

```bash
uvicorn myapp:app
```


## Posting gzip file

Posting the file to the api (needs gzip [installed](https://www.gzip.org)):

```bash
{!./src/tutorial/tutorial_17_gzip_request_body_curl.bash!}
```

